lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: KIVA is a wonderful way for a person to assist another in achieving their dream. We are one world.
lender.occupational_info: I do part time volunteer work for Habitat For Humanity.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish you feed him for a day but ... If you teach a man to fish you feed him for a lifetime
lender.occupational_info: The greatest job anyone could ever be blessed to perform

lender.name: iwan
lender.loan_because: I want to start a business
lender.occupational_info: I rent a place to start my work

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupational_info: Seminary student in Philly. Previously a volunteer teacher in a rural Chinese college.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Poverty is the #1 killer of people and is entirely man-made. This is my way of eliminating poverty.

lender.name: Upasana
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who are helping themselves by working hard to improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Like most Silicon Valley professionals, I get paid a lot for nothing! I discuss new products ideas for my company's web services for an insane amount of time everyday! However, my professional work does NOT define me.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Capitalism has, can and will change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: We all work for somebody even if it is for God. It is my pleasure to help you help yourself for that glory.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: it will work when people help people directly.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is one of the most direct and efficient ways private persons can contribute to improving the livelihoods of people with difficult access to financial loans.
lender.occupational_info: Matching private companies with initiatives in developing countries.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of American military veteran's in an outpatient clinic.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: i dont have stable job here in philippines, and i want to help my family to start a small business here in philippines
lender.occupational_info: my income is not enough for my family and i want give them a better life in the future

lender.name: Khamis
lender.loan_because: I hope to have a loan to my smale project , I have Bsc computer programmer and this Loan help me to buy PC ,Printer, and digital camera
lender.occupational_info: very important for me becuse now I hane not ant work or jop I will start this project Imediatly when i got it . I have 5 childern and wife 4 of my kids at school I think one of my childer get out his school to help me when he work here the situation very hard for life , thanks for all to read this massege and please help me.

lender.name: A Course in Miracles
lender.loan_because: Only what we give is truly ours

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a leg up to get started.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and maintain equipment used to cure cancer patients.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: It's time to do Gods bidding and reach out to each other. I see everyday people not that different from me. There are just trying to make a better life for themselves and their family. How could I not help.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: The hardest step is the first one
lender.occupational_info: Beliving in myslef and telling others how I can make a difference to them.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am a hard working individual who knows how hard it is to make dreams come true. I hope that my donations can help someone realize that he or she can be successful where ever he or she may reside. I believe all people can achieve their dreams with a little help from a friend.

lender.name: Iqri Sulizar
lender.loan_because: I need capital to buy new computer (Pentium 4 Centrino). This computer/notebook i can use to developt consultant webdesign and software database (my small business).
lender.occupational_info: If someone or company want to create website. I can design interface, create code web and database. also i can help to create software database.

lender.name: René
lender.loan_because: I have had all the luck in the world living and growing up where I am. Through incentives like this, just maybe I can help people reach a similar level to the one that I enjoy as 'normal'.
lender.occupational_info: I help people finding the information they need to do their work, and guiding them to knowledge they didn't have before.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: people helped me when I started from nothing. I want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make the most of who they are and live a great life.

lender.name: Zach
lender.occupational_info: AmeriCorps VISTA

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Anytime my local community can add value to our global community it just seems like the right thing to do.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: Helping others is what gives life meaning.
lender.occupational_info: We make the machine that makes the world go around.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of entrepreneurship, and people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: The concept of financial planning would seem ridiculous to poor people in the world. How do you manage your extra money?

lender.name: D
lender.loan_because: I believe in reaching out to others to offer a hand up...

lender.name: Julie & Dale
lender.loan_because:
Because others have given so much to us... we believe by "paying it forward" we can show gratitude for our own blessings.
OK, so in lieu of more toys that our friends' children don't need, we loan money through Kiva in the child’s name. Then, when the loan is repayed, they get the money. A year later, they get to decide whether to take the repaid loan as cash, or recycle it by loaning it again to someone new.
I like this.
lender.occupational_info: Wife does office work helping to enroll students in a private school outside Los Angeles, California; husband manages financial institutions (credit unions).

lender.name: Donald
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired certified public accountant.

lender.name: Len Estill
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly lucky to live in freedom and want to help those who haven't had the opportunities I've been given. I also wish to assist someone who makes their living sewing, as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work out of my home making items for sale at local shops. My specialty is using vintage and antique goods (such as fabrics, laces, quilts and all kinds of supplies I find at thrift stores, garage sales and generous friends) to make items for resale. I started my business when my son was small so I could be home with him. He is now grown and I'm semi-retired. Sewing has given me a creative outlet that has brought me peace and joy, and provided me a good living in the company of many wonderful people.

lender.name: Scott, Shannon, Saffron
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the foundation of the economy, and no small business can flourish without access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business designing and manufacturing furniture.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: My money can make a difference for many people. Working for one's own happiness alone, makes no sense.
lender.occupational_info: I help people here in the U.S. save money on their home mortgages by getting them fair interest rates.

lender.name: muawia
lender.loan_because: iwant povertiy pepole around the world feel more comfartable,in gaining thier expenss of living.
lender.occupational_info: acturlly ,igive acure medicine to illness pepole, wheneverand where ever need helps.in camps,hospitals,and in streets ...ext

lender.name: celeste
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Working as a subdivision to the state of Alaska to preserve and enhance natural resources.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Something that makes so little difference to me can make so much difference to these people and their families.

lender.name: Ken
lender.occupation: Singer, Engineer, Soldier, and now Lender
lender.loan_because:
'Do not store up for yourselves treasure on earth, where moth and rust destroy, and where thieves break in and steal. But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven.."
Matthew 6:19-20

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: people need money and I have money.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to hear how God wants me to love people and help others do the same.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: ...it matters.

lender.name: SHL
lender.loan_because: I believe a little can go a long way. And if a lot of people do a lot of "little" then it will become a lot of a lot!
lender.occupational_info: I am just a regular guy. I wake up, go to work, eat, sleep, and do it all over again the next day. As a hobby, I am a soccer referee.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: All that I possess is a blessing from God. I want share that blessing with others who deserve and need love from others.
lender.occupational_info: Electronics Technician

lender.name: vanessa
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in life. As a single mother of three I want to share what I can, and I hope to instill in my children the desire to give back.
lender.occupational_info: US Navy retired.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together, and I can do something to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college courses in English composition, literature, and adult education.

lender.name: Loren
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to strive to better oneself. If I can make a small contribution to someone's dream, then I am enriched!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a furniture store in my hometown. Our large showroom displays living room,bedroom and dining room furnishings. I assist our customers in choosing their new furniture. I am paid by the hour and I receive a percentage of my sales as a commission.

lender.name: Harry and Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It helps people improve their situation.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself to have a chance at improving their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: A giant headache of paperwork and numbers.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It makes a powerful impact!
lender.occupational_info: Teach people how to become successful in their personal and professional lives

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to make an adequate living for them and their children, but need a helping hand to get started!

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because:
"I do not believe one can settle how much we ought to give.... I am afraid the only safe rule is to give more than we can spare. If our charities do not at all pinch or hamper us, I should say they are too small. There ought to be things we should like to do and cannot do because our charities expenditure excludes them."
-C.S. Lewis

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in business. Want to change the world? Educate a girl.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can achieve peace if we each do what we can to make the world a better place.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is direct and personal.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I can. Why not help someone in need?
lender.occupational_info: I am temporarily taking care of my sister's children.

lender.name: Irina
lender.occupation: Serial Fashion Entrepreneur, CEO of aXXa
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be entrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: Creating new fashion baseball caps for the youth.

lender.name: Gibby
lender.loan_because:
Please join Team AccuScore! Kiva and other groups have and will continue to truly change the world by fostering independence and self reliance via microfinance.
Entrepreneurship is not defined by any economic means but by one’s spirit. There is no difference between Kiva entrepreneurs and venture-backed dot-coms. As fellow entrepreneurs, AccuScore supports the entrepreneurial spirit of any size, in any land.
PLEASE CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO JOIN TEAM ACCUSCORE!!

lender.name: Lora
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and families that need this money more than I do. ♥

lender.name: John & Lois
lender.loan_because: We hope to help people be able to help themself and their family .
lender.occupational_info: We work several jobs in order to raise enough revenue to fund ministry in 3 small rural independent churches. We re-opened the churches that had been previously closed by large Christian denominations due to declining population. We have learned through the success of these small churches that all things are possible through God.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: By American standards, I am barely middle class. By world standards, I am really wealthy. I want to share my good fortune with others to help make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I used to copy edit manuscripts for publication, including manuscripts for professional journals, dissertations, and textbooks. I am now retired and enjoy every minute of every day.

lender.name: Shannon, Peter, Berkeley
lender.loan_because: We loan because it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I develop curriculum for trade schools. My husband makes people feel better by having them lift weights and exercise. Berkeley brings joy to our lives by just being a dog and doing what dogs do.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world and small amounts of money can make a major difference in the developing world. "We are All One" in humanity and this is a great expression of that Unity!
lender.occupational_info: Retired Scientist

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me. Now it's my turn to help those less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: We, as a people have lost a sense of compassion and kindness in the world. We can advance as a race more efficiently if we just learn to co-exist. Where is our humanity?

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are trying in spite of obstacles to make a place for themselves
lender.occupational_info: Now I am a volunteer in my community trying to payback for all the luck I have had

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve success and believe self-sufficient people are our best hope for peace around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs get their companies to where they need to be to ensure success.

lender.name: Bill and Gina
lender.loan_because: We must become the change we wish to see - Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: Creating new medicines for unmet medical needs

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets me help in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I would install or fix complex machines.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: We are all a part of a global family - sharing my resources with the members of this family.
lender.occupational_info: Providing spiritual resources and support to prison inmates.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to loan and it makes so much sense.

lender.name: brooke
lender.loan_because: i love to help others!
lender.occupational_info: i am a student studying cosmetology.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do. I'm lucky enough to be in a position to help others and am happy that I can help grow new businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help make movies

lender.name: Kate Irene
lender.loan_because: We are all our sister's & brother's keepers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kerryn
lender.loan_because: Families helping other families to educate and care for their children is a positive step towards the peace we all long to have.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a University.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: by connecting one on one with others who share our goal to change the world for the better we will make a difference.

lender.name: greenboogers
lender.occupation: Your going to die soon, get in the game
lender.loan_because: If it feels good do it.

lender.name: Tabitha
lender.loan_because: I believe in an interdependent world. I believe in passing forward the help that has been given to me and I believe that if we all helped each other out this way, our world will greatly improve.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites and help market people and companies. I am also creating a website to support artists as well.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my own life to have the opportunities that an economically secure foundation and family provide. I realize most people are not born with such advantages.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and study history so that I can better understand world affairs past and present. I hope to help the next generation to do the same. If we help to generate understanding and compassion towards the people of the world in the younger generation, we will have a more hopeful tomorrow.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I live in a part of the world with great surplus of resources.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff is an entertainer and filmmaker.

lender.name: Black Rice
lender.loan_because: Help who works for their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Facing computer monitors 10+hrs a day and think about everything.

lender.name: salameh
lender.loan_because: To start my own business - mini market – in Jordan - Amman
lender.occupational_info: I am working now in Saudi Arabia, and i am thinking to go back to my country – Jordan to state my business

lender.name: Sanne Østergaard
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others in need, and I like the whole concept of offering people a loan without interests. The fact that I know who I'm lending my money to makes me want to get more involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a medical student i Denmark - in two years I will have finished my education and I will be a real doctor.

lender.name: Gail
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to help people at my company get their work done. I also run a side business selling fine china that I purchase at auction.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I believe many people could make great improvements in their own and others' lives if they just had a little bit of money to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the American embassy and try to help Americans and those from other countries to better understand each other.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I care about sustainability and small scale changes to create larger improvements. A single small venture can by a catalyst for greater improvements in the local scene and have a disproportionally high impact.
lender.occupational_info: I focus on sustainability and conservation of the environment, specifically in cooperation with human needs.

lender.name: Deta Program
lender.occupational_info: This is a group of high school students who work together to raise money for non-profit agencies.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It feels right.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government making sure that businesses honor their promises to employees in regards to pensions.

lender.name: Carollee
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for it. I think it is a great idea!

lender.name: Loren
lender.loan_because: I think that sustainable development is the more important way that we can help developing countries thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization whose sole mission is preventing child abuse. My job is to raise funds for our programming and managing projects and special events.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: Because I want to change the world.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I direct people and create images that help make your product or services better looking.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals are the most powerful agents for change and that those of us who have been financially successful can empower those with fewer resources to create that change.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from a corporate job and am using my time and skills to help non-profits achieve their goals.

lender.name: Earth
lender.loan_because: One earth, one dream.

lender.name: Abu
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who are really in need as one day I may also happen to be in their shoes. Helping others is one small way of thanking God for giving us His bounties.
lender.occupational_info: Inbound Tours / Hotel Business

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to be of service. I want to make someone's life better.
lender.occupational_info: Being a grandmother is universally understood.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make computer software :)

lender.name: Photo Grafix
lender.loan_because: I hope to help talented and self-motivated entrepreneurs get an extra boost to make their dreams of serving others and supporting their families a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I retouch photos. That is, my studio makes photos look better for advertising agencies, publishers and photographers. This includes fixing damaged photos for individuals. We also teach it for those who like to do it themselves.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and it is the most satisfying thing anyone can do with money. This is my very small way of sharing and I hope it helps these ambitious folks.
lender.occupational_info: Retired purchasing agent

lender.name: Arin
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: James & Kelly
lender.loan_because: I was initially impressed by Kiva's vision to promote sustainable development by loaning rather than donating, thus creating a culture of individual responsibility and accountability. I have a been a member for a few years now, and all of my loans have been repaid in full - as a result we continue to increase our outstanding commitment with each repayment!

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in other countries develop businesses to benefit themselves and their families

lender.name: van Dongen
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage entrepreneurship in economically developing communities, and micro-lending provides the means and the hope for economic development, one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Family Physician

lender.name: Kirstin
lender.loan_because: It is such a simple thing to do which can make a positive impact on someone else's life. I think it is a wonderful system and love that I can continue to reloan the money I have invested.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I hope to to change the world in a positive way, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help disabled people find out what jobs they can perform.

lender.name: Loesken
lender.loan_because: I was able to get loans myself when I tried to establish my own business, which became succesful.
lender.occupational_info: I sell travel arrangements to clients who like to visit other countries.

lender.name: LoydB
lender.loan_because: It's better than getting more "stuff".
lender.occupational_info: Research and mitigation of computer security vulnerabilities.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate. Everyone deserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: What's the point if you don't help others?

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on the goodness I have been shown in my own life. We all deserve equal shares of happiness, and success.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to the most beautiful places, meet incredible individuals, and am introduced to cultures that have nutured me into having a more tolerant, pure heart.

lender.name: rebecca & alain
lender.loan_because: we like to help people who help others.
lender.occupational_info: rebecca is in wine sales and alain is a director of a small business.

lender.name: Akash
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live a life of success and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying to get a degree in Economics. I also work part time as a Marketing Representative.

lender.name: DIDIER
lender.loan_because: .°. IN HUMAN GENRE I TRUST .°.

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: I develop internet infrastructure for integrating financial systems together

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I've got enough.
lender.occupational_info: I make the characters in video games move.

lender.name: Rogers Park Moms!
lender.loan_because: Our mom's group decided that, instead of buying birthday presents for each other, we'd all chip in to make a Kiva loan. This way we can help other mothers all around the world
lender.occupational_info: We are teachers, students, therapists, researchers, filmmakers, and writers. We're also all learning how hard it is to raise children--even in the best of circumstances!

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways and want to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the design and construction of buildings.

lender.name: Audra
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.occupation: Corporate Middle Management/ Full Time Student
lender.loan_because: I have had some great opportunities to better my life and I know there are a lot of people out there that just need that chance
lender.occupational_info: I work in a call center. People call a toll free number and I supervise the people that answer the phone

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ryan & Laura
lender.loan_because: We love to invest in people!
lender.occupational_info: We show families how to become debt free and financially independent.

lender.name: Olajide
lender.loan_because: Charity starts from home. We all have to contribute in order to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur: Web Designer, Developer, Programmer, DJ.... Worker...

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: It is an interesting way to make contact with and help those in communities far away make a difference in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of law an justice studies and am interested in studying and understanding why inequalities exist in law and politics in the United States and across the world.

lender.name: Phil & Robin
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is a wonderful way to make a difference in peoples lives. Kiva makes it so easy to help others who want to better their living situation for themselves and their loved ones.

lender.name: Rupesh Kumar
lender.loan_because: Love to see the peoples to win from nothing.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: wwjd

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a great form of sharing.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Being part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial construction of upscale senior citizen housing.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Todd and his wonderful daughters Haley and Harper have been blessed with good health and good fortune within their small family. We believe in supporting those who are trying their hardest to improve their lives and environment. Kiva provides a wonderful avenue for us to provide help to others who are trying to achieve the same, Thanks Kiva!!

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I loan because I respect the hopes and dreams of people everywhere, and to show my deep gratitude for the opportunity to pursue my own.
lender.occupational_info: I sing early music (composed before 1750) with a group of wonderful friends. We are called The Rose Ensemble.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make them happy.

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: "when the power of love overcomes the love of power - then we will know peace"

lender.name: Peter Deeley
lender.loan_because: We all should do at least a little bit.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I believe that even a small act by one single person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer in a small town in Virginia, USA.

lender.name: Cheri
lender.occupational_info: Working with children with Autism.

lender.name: Jim and Susan
lender.loan_because: Having traveled much in poorer parts of the world, we realize how much difference you can make by a small loan and simply by caring.
lender.occupational_info: We teach American college students and try to make them better citizens of the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe those that can help, should help.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers

lender.name: August & Cliff
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help people start businesses who might otherwise not have been able to get going.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Michigan (in the U.S.A) and hope to be able to visit many of the places featured on Kiva. It would be great to see how good an impact these loans can make.

lender.name: Peg
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an effective way to help entrepreneurs all over the world succeed and contribute to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Before retiring I directed a program at University of Wisconsin-Madison that introduced new students (and their parents) to the university and helped them make the transition from high school to college.

lender.name: Mercedes
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to help other people who are willing to help themself...But more than anything I want to know who I am helping, Giving some money to charity is fine, but this way I believe I make a more direct impact in somebody's life.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: it's the easy, right thing to do.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: Even in my abundant life, there have been times when a small loan and someone's belief in me made all the difference. I want to share that gift of belief and the goodness I experience in my life - doing my part to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a virtual assistant, a webdesigner, graphic designer and photographer - and enjoy trying my hand at new skills.

lender.name: Ronke
lender.loan_because: We are all interconnected. Imagine how beautiful and happy the world would be if we all enjoy abundance. Utopia is attainable - with higher consciousness. I'm proud of all Kiva lenders for redefining the term 'neighborliness'
lender.occupational_info: Secondary school teacher

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy!

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people!
lender.occupational_info: Student who wants to be in the healthcare field.

lender.name: Liza & Donn

lender.name: Philomena
lender.loan_because: Maybe my small loan will be significant in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a children's book illustrator. I create the pictures that go with the story in a child's picture book.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I admire ambition and value humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses sell their products. I generate product interest within the minds of product buyers.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I was given much, and want to share what I have with those who have not.

lender.name: Politics and Government

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: tati
lender.loan_because: I want make a small business (home made) make cookies and bakery for help my husband to make more income because he doesn't have work anymore

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in the idea of lending some of my resources on a small scale to enable another person to create their own wealth and thereby dramatically improve their living conditions in a sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I help to run a company which designs microchips.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I care about hard working people. We have to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: My work is simple. I work in a office in front of a computer. I respect hard working people because I have worked very hard to earn what I have for my family and me. God bless and peace to all.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: poco a poco

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Because I can, I should. And it makes me feel good to help someone across the world, particularly where Americans are not so popular right now. I'm glad Kiva provides the chance to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help make the American legal system work the way it should. I work for the government with their system to provide healthcare and wages for workers who have been hurt on the job.

lender.name: Vidura Barrios
lender.loan_because: It was through a small business loan that we started our business so I know the value of being given a chance. Kiva is a great organization and thanks to all of you for donating your time and money.

lender.loan_because: To Develop Software House to fullfill requirments locally & to Capture export Market.

lender.name: Chris & Kristen
lender.loan_because: Leviticus 25:35-37 " 'If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, help him as you would an alien or a temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you. Do not take interest of any kind from him, but fear your God, so that your countryman may continue to live among you. You must not lend him money at interest or sell him food at a profit.
lender.occupational_info: We are a graduate student and an employee of a company that manages apartments.

lender.name: MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur (www.BusinessPlanMaster.com and www.CaliforniaRendezvous.com ) and former Peace Corps volunteer, I appreciate the skills that entrepreneurs bring, from all over the world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am a world traveller and have always felt strongly about giving back to the global community, especially in direct concrete ways. I am a huge advocate of thinking globally and acting locally and hope to do what little I can to contribute to a better world for us all.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a University. My classes are about food, development, and culture. I also work with farmers in Central America to help them gain secure rights to their land.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Small loans are the best way to stimulate small businesses.

lender.name: Mohamed
lender.loan_because:
I want recover from my financial problem. However, My Parents got a loan from the landlord for high rate intrest for our house construction.
As i am an elder son, its my responsibility to repay the loan. so that i came to Saudi Arabia to earn money to repay my loan as well as to fullfil my dreams as to run the Social work organization.
Besides, I am gaining Rs.20000 per month and i have been paid Rs.5000/month. Since last two years i am paying intrest only and i could not save the money because i want to send money to my parents, my wife and for my personal expense.
I could not return to india since my financial barrier.
lender.occupational_info:
If i got a loan from Kiva.org. i will be repay my loan and i can save Rs.5000/month which will be easy to repay my loan.
Eventhough, its out of kivo.org's scop i apply for my individual growth towards to uplift deprived people.

lender.name: Benny, Gem, Edi & Diesel
lender.loan_because: My father helped me become involved with Kiva, he has shared his passion of caring for others with me. I am so greatful to be able to help others in this way! Thanks Dad!
lender.occupational_info: Caring for sick children in Hospital

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am taking a Microfinance class at Uni (Sweden) this summer. And I have a special interest in random topic, like Roma people (that's why picking my friend Nikola). I want to give people an opportunity to create a better living. It could have been my family, if I was born elsewhere...
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with development & humanitarian aid, for a Swedish organization, based in Uppsala.The organization supports some microfinance projects, via the partner organizations in different countries around the world. Besides that it is also supporting development projects and humanitarian work.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have had lots of loans so I thought I should share with people who need credit more than I do. The best reason to borrow money is to invest it. To succeed in business, income must exceed expenses over time and some profit should be re-invested to develop the enterprise or start a new venture.
lender.occupational_info: We have a little boy named John who is autistic. He is learning to play baseball and getting better after 5 years of therapy .. thank God

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the example of Muhammad Yunas and the Grameen Bank.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects that organize and design manufacturing facilities and the work that occurs there.

lender.loan_because: Solicito Prestamo par incrementar mi cultivo de CAFE COLOMBIANO de exportacion. teniendo la oportunidad que el dolar esta a la baja, sale muy economico comprar Ganado y tambien cultivar, cuando hay cosecha el precio sube, es buena inversion. favor apoyen al ideal. no hay perdida.
lender.occupational_info:
COMPRO GANADO Y LOTES DE CAFE COLOMBIANO, FRUTAS Y VERDURAS. PARA LA REVENTA, TENGO CONTACTO DIRECTAMENTE CON LOS CULTIVADORES. SE PUEDEN EXPORTAR. MUY BUEN PRECIO.

lender.loan_because: It's one small thing I can do. I don't have any control over a lot of things that are going on in the world, but I can do this.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public health, where we try to keep people healthy instead of making them well after they get sick.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I do

lender.name: Shyriz
lender.loan_because: Because i want to repay my suppliers as they provide not more than 30 days credit

lender.loan_because: He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done. Proverbs 19:17
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children to play the piano

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Providing capital to small businesses which do not have access to capital is an excellent way to help both the entrepreneurs and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Former teacher and human resources professional

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe that you will get what you give. I think we all should give help to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses, businesses, land. I am a Real Estate Agent

lender.name: Eden Central Schools
lender.loan_because: We conducted a penny drive to raise money for Kiva.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to share what I have with my community, and that community is the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students about educational administration. For example, I teach many things that someone who wants to be a college or university administrator would want to know about that job.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva helps people help themselves. I loan because Kiva does not take any overhead & I know exactly where my money is going. I loan because I'm helping small businesses grow in a time when big business is taking over everywhere and making it hard for small farmers or storeowners. I loan because $25 is a negligible deduction from my life and a huge impact on others'. I loan because as the loans are repaid I will be able to reuse that money to loan more and more each year.
lender.occupational_info: I head the interior design team for a company that manufacturers luxury houseboats.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I've received a lot of help from others and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: small home-based business that connects with the whole world through the internet

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: To help make dreams come true for those who are less fortunate and need financial assistance and encouragement to better their lives.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: it is a chance for me to give back to those who need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I have a home business and do court transcripts from home as well. No 9 to 5 for me!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to make a difference.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people set up scholarships and bursaries at a Canadian university.

lender.name: mercy
lender.loan_because: I am from Africa and I know first hand how microloans can impact peoples lives. I'm very excited to help people achieve their dreams of financial independence
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Reference librarian. Its an exciting job coz I love helping people. I assist people with research projects and also help patrons find reading material

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I work to better understand surficial stream flow processes and how people effect them mandated by the Endanger Species Act. The primary purpose of my position is to support biologist in drafting biological opinions with technical expertise.

lender.name: Homer
lender.loan_because:
Someone needs it, I have it and can do it!
"But for the grace of God go I!"

lender.name: mauyvcbc
lender.occupation: teens apparel online, discount running apparel, mens leather apparel

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: It allows me to make a difference from my living room
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Ebrima S.
lender.loan_because: I want take loan to enable me continued my work to serve humanity as a youth welfare activist
lender.occupational_info: I am youth welfare activist. I am working tirelessly for the empowerment of youth. I have the strong conviction that it is only when the youth are empowered through capacity building, can they then realize their potential and take part in national development. Youth's poverty alleviation should really be a political priority.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I think that my small loan assistance can help them in a great way.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies manage projects and tasks.

lender.name: Sharada Jambulapati
lender.loan_because: giving someone a chance to succeed is rewarding.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy music and being in nature.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is empowering to be in the position to promote real change.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is the right, and the righteous thing to do. Jesus said "If you love me, then feed my sheep."

lender.name: Tierney
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve the satisfaction and security of a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Slooh.com - a live astronomical observatory. We connect telescopes to the internet and provide live views of space to members in over 70 countries.

lender.name: Prof. Dr.
lender.loan_because: The only way for people (and families, villages, and countries) to survive and increase their standard of living is to have access to and build upon capital. The NY Times bestselling book The End of Poverty by Jeffrey Sachs is must reading for everyone who is interested in Kiva, microlending, or helping others in the "third world." Kiva members: please be aware that only supporting microfinance as the sole solution for ending extreme poverty is wrong. Without extended directed humanitarian relief (such as health care, food, etc) and foreign support for public investment (in health care, education, family planning, infrastructure, administration, etc) microlending can only have limited effectiveness and the poverty trap CANNOT BE BROKEN. Urge your elected officials to actually fund the commitments that the US and many other countries have made to the Millenium Development Goals (MDG)! See: http://devdata.worldbank.org/atlas-mdg/ for MDG data. Hans Rosling on development (AV presentations): http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/view/id/92 http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/view/id/140 Jeffrey Sachs (audio lectures): http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio4/reith2007/ There are opportunities and dilemmas in providing access to capital. In many situations, providing capital (tools and opportunities) can be wonderful; in other situations counterproductive. For example, providing loans for someone to sell an imported good that is unhealthy for the local population and environmentally unsound is ethically troublesome (cigarettes are the perfect example). I hope Kiva and its partners will acknowledge, learn about, and discuss these issues and not try to ignore them. Microlending is in its early stages and still needs research and development to further its helpfulness and sophistication. Funding individuals and organizations through Kiva helps establish the cycle that allows everyone (lenders, lending intermediaries, and borrowers) to learn, build, and learn again to find the right methods and opportunities to create healthful and sustainable change. "Capital as such is not evil; it is its wrong use that is evil. Capital in some form or other will always be needed." Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: --teaching the next generation --researching to increase our knowledge

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I do a lot of volunteer work with disadvantaged families here in Phoenix, and this gives me a chance to do something on a more "global" scale--but still within my own means! What a great concept. I am presently reading "Banker to the Poor" by Muhammad Yunus, Founder of Grameen Bank; if you want a true inspiration, read this book!!
lender.occupational_info: I write stories for the local, community newspaper. It is free to the people who live in the community, and comes out once a month.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is an incredible way to empower those in need. My life is very blessed and it is in giving back that instantly creates more abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I share the vision of Health, Kindness, and Opportunity. Without our health, we cannot create and sustain our dream. Health is kindness, kindness is health. We make health pleasuable. Taste and experience the difference with FrequenSea ... a whole food liquid that supplied the body with all the raw materials to sustain optimal health. It taste incredible!

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I love to see other peope thrive, prosper and grow!

lender.name: Cure Huntington Disease!
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, especially those who help and serve others.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupation: teach anthropology, sociology at community college

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's money I would've wasted on useless things.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.

lender.name: Ori
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Columbia University majoring in Mathematics and Economics

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the best lending program I've heard of and I like the feeling that I'm helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I see great value in helping those who are determined to make better their own lives (and subsequently their community's) through hard work and innovation.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help our clients find the right IT talent. We are commonly referred to as recruiters or headhunters.

lender.name: 1John 3:17
lender.loan_because:
I loan because God loves me. I loan because it pleases God, the creator of all things, the one true God, who sent His only son to die for my sins. It is with great gratitude and thankfulness that I do the will of God according to the Bible; HIS word alone.
1 John 3:17 James 2:15-16 Deut 15:7 Deut 15:11 Matthew 19:21 Matthew 25:35 Luke 12:33 Luke 18:22 And about 100 other passages from my King James Bible.
lender.occupational_info: Mine is the work of God who created me. I'm just someone lucky enough to have been born in a country where truth is available without oppression and blessed enough to have the saving knowledge of Jesus Christ in my life.

lender.name: Princess Ayo
lender.loan_because: This idea struck me as something anyone can do. Matilde touched my heart and as a mother and grandmother I can imagine her struggle as she works to keep her family together body, mind and soul.
lender.occupational_info:
I write and deliver training to staff at Prison Fellowship Ministries. PFM is a Christian company which encourages churches to go into prisons and preach the gospel, encourage the people in there and help anyone that wants it, a way to stay out of prison once released.
When I'm not there, I am a writer, African storyteller and artist. In the picture above I am telling African stories to second graders in a primary school. Being a professional storyteller means I get paid to tell tales. I do this for schools, churches, libraries, museums and companies.

lender.name: Nicholas Krump
lender.loan_because: Money in the hands of the 'people' wanting to participate in capitalism and democracy creates change. This change impacts families and future generations.
lender.occupational_info: Safety culture change work

lender.name: Koncept Films
lender.loan_because: I believe that to give whenever possible is the surest path toward happiness!
lender.occupational_info: I am a storyteller...a storyteller within the landscape of moving pictures, music, and words!

lender.name: Harvest Investment Club
lender.occupational_info: We are a seven person investment club that formed nearly ten years ago.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: microloans work!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe giving entrepreneurs access to capital is an excellent way to make a difference and encourage people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sing and entertain people.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have lived in many different parts of the world and have found kind, good and happy people everywhere that have given me help and assistance. It is one smally way to return the help I have recieved. In turn it is hoped that these people too will continue to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Before I built offshore oil platforms and pipelines. Now I work in my garden and walk in the hills around my home.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help an actual person move along in their financial lives. Each loan adds to the security and the quality of the lives of those I work with. I think it is a real treat to get that chance to play some small part in the lives of others!
lender.occupational_info: I teach school.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: In memory of my son Ryan who loved to do missionary work and help the unfortunate. We lost Ryan to cancer in January 2007 at the age of 29

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: ...I can. I want to be able to do something worthwhile with my money so that hopefully other people can do the same.

lender.name: A very lucky family
lender.occupation: mommy, daddy, big sister, and little brother

lender.name: Rachel & Carlos Mino
lender.loan_because: We care about helping others have opportunities to succeed and thrive. We would like to share the advantages we have had in life with others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Rachel - I am a public interest attorney. Carlos - I am an attorney with Bingham McCutchen in Palo Alto. I practice in the patent litigation group.

lender.name: The Henson Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone obtain the opportunity to provide for their family.

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: I want to do a small part to try to improve the world. Helping people who want to work towards a goal is a good first step. Kiva makes it possible to help people who need it, when they need it, and it is great to be part of it. It is very exciting to have the opportunity to microfinance small businesses in developing countries and to know that I am participating, in some small way, with their development and success!

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I want to have a direct impact on people to improve their situation and help them contribute to their community and society. I hope all our contributions will cause a catalysis make the world a better place for all, even those who have no voice.
lender.occupational_info: I help the military share and distribute information between soldiers who are in the field adapting to situations and those who are getting ready to go to the field who can learn from those changes.

lender.name: Peace Dog
lender.loan_because: Others don't have a great family like me.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: People should help people who need a hand.

lender.name: William N.
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small copier company, we sell and service most major brands of copy machines and supplies. I have 2 employees besides myself.

lender.name: Talia

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I would like to see motivated persons get ahead in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I represent an insurance company that insures people against casualty and loss.

lender.name: Josh, Meredith & Noah

lender.name: abby and jared

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help someone that wants to work, that wants to make it work!

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: its a tangible way of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: University clinic

lender.name: Rebecca

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to support myself with my own business and would like to share this with other people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I do illustrations of products to help companies sell them and show people how to use them, create logos to help companies have a public identity, and I design other materials to help businesses and non-profit organizations reach their audiences. These business applications of art allow me to spend my free time painting.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I believe Jesus calls us to help our brothers and sisters. My money is not my own, but belongs to God and as much as that is hard to wrap my brain around, I'm trying. I am trying to grow more and more generous. Luke 12:48: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a church and help families raise their children to know a relationship with Jesus Christ. I create fun activities and teachings for them to experience the kingdom of God.

lender.name: Rita & Jerry
lender.loan_because: everyone with a dream or goal to improve their circumstances deserves the opportunity to achieve it!

lender.name: Lisa and Aidan

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired U.S. government worker, and I helped write important documents for the U.S. Congress.

lender.name: Carolyn

lender.occupational_info: full-time mother, part-time preschool teacher

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to share with others. While I do not earn much money as a teacher, I have chosen to go without Starbuck's this month to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach biology and biotechnology to students in grades 9-12.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is what business is for.

lender.name: Randy Souders
lender.loan_because: "Spreading the wealth around" is a good thing. As poor people prosper their generosity becomes even more astounding. I like that I can provide borrowers an alternative to predatory lenders. Lending helps me feel connected to others around the world and that I'm making a small difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a full time artist (painter) since 1978.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be living in the Global North.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am working toward an elementary teaching credential.

lender.name: Jennifer & John
lender.loan_because: What a fantastic way to help people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for an electric utility.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupation: Travel Agent and small business owner

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: my life is good and I want to help other people to make their lives better.

lender.name: Joe Gonzales
lender.loan_because: I participate with Kiva in gratitude for all that I have and as an act for social justice.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: people have given me microloans when I needed them and it made all the difference in the world, so it only seems appropriate to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I am developing a global study abroad program, focusing on sustainability issues. I also am an adjunct Asian historian and a proud liberal Episcopalian.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I'm extremely concerned about the plight of women around the world and want to help at least a few women gain more control over their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I do some volunteer work and knit for children in Afghanistan through the Afghans for Afghans project.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to see individuals working toward self reliance......and positive vision, industry, and initiative are important in my life, too. The Kiva experience lets me imagine we are all one family.
lender.occupational_info: I help children and families get their strengths working FOR them. I have been lucky enough to work for 15 years using music therapy, with children and adolescents in a residential treatment centre, and in a cancer clinic.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: It is a simple solution with a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in international trade, import customs compliance, and logistics.

lender.name: C. Shane
lender.loan_because: I believe that microlending can do amazing things for people. I work as an adviser to Four Horsemen Investments at the University of Puget Sound which is the only student managed debt fund in the US. We use microlending as our platform to educate students about using a debt fund for community service.
lender.occupational_info: I work with managers that are in charge of building the Boeing 787 to develop build plans, manage day to day work, and manage emergent projects that impact the production schedule.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel that we all belong. As if we were siblings. It makes me feel closer to you all.

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: this is the 1st step to help fight global proverty. and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: well, CEO of my household=housewife, get it!

lender.name: Bubble
lender.loan_because: My owners would like to help good people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work. I sleep all day. One of my owners sells televisions. The other writes stuff.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I create magazines and invitations using a computer. I also enjoy photography.

lender.name: Marieke
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance in having a better life, and I believe entrepreneurship is the great way to go.
lender.occupational_info: My company makes people known on the internet. I help people use online networking strategically. I help people to be found better by Google. My skills are marketing, sales and internet.

lender.name: sameer
lender.loan_because: ...a small amount in one's world can have a huge impact in someone else's world.
lender.occupational_info: When financial firms are looking for qualified people to hire, I find those people for them.

lender.name: Wilson
lender.loan_because: I'm hoping my loan will help improve somebody's life. People just need an opportunity.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: JOEY FABS
lender.loan_because: PEOPLE NEED HELP, IT MAKES ME FEEL GREAT!

lender.name: sally
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach young children of many different ages. At the end of my career I only taught reading to at risk students.

lender.name: Div. 21
lender.loan_because: We care about people in the world around us.
lender.occupational_info: We are a grade 6/7 class.

lender.name: Maison Charlebois
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. Bravo to Kiva for doing just that!
lender.occupational_info: Unique gourmet products for the curious gourmet

lender.name: John and Donna
lender.loan_because: We are blessed by God and happy to share with others and to encourage them to become the most they can be.
lender.occupational_info: Donna teaches Adult Education to students from around the world. John is Pastor to a Congregation in a university community.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: It's good to do good things and stuff.
lender.occupational_info: Computer things and stuff

lender.name: Daniel and Mariana
lender.loan_because: We know the difference between a hand up and a hand out. (not original quote, but very well said)

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for those who had faith in me when I started my business.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's only money... trading government-printed paper into opportunity for someone seems like the best deal in the world!
lender.occupational_info: Some people tell stories verbally; some people make movies to tell their stories; I tell stories using words; I write the words down because someone might read them. Life is all about making connections with God's best.

lender.name: STAR
lender.loan_because: MY GRAMA SAYS IT IS WHAT GOD WANTS US TO DO!

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: we all need to help each other.

lender.name: aristacare
lender.loan_because: Just Because

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: this is something reasonable that I am able to do to help others on my salary.
lender.occupational_info: As a librarian for a public library, I help people find whatever information they need.

lender.name: Odette
lender.loan_because: I think it's great to have the opportunity to be involved in the development of micro businesses in other countries. As the owner of a fledgling business, I know how hard it is to get finance to realise your dreams!

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I believe that bootstrap banking is the only way to effect lasting economic improvement in the world. Plus, it just feels so great!
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses develop an effective and self-editable online presence.

lender.name: Elliott and Jayne
lender.loan_because: We are so very blessed, and we believe in giving a helping hand to those seeking to better their life.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others maintain and grow their own personal wealth.

lender.name: J.R. and Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to see people enabled to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in real estate developing housing for students as well as helping people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: G. R.
lender.loan_because: I need to.
lender.occupational_info: Just passing through.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva really highlights what helping others is about. Anyone can give random people $25-50 and go on with life having the "I did something nice" feeling, but loaning through Kiva goes deeper than that; it is a chance to learn about how others live throughout the world and potentially make a friend. 10 years ago, a person would need to take time off work and a trip around the world to experience what Kiva offers to both the recipient and lender.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a scheduled 9 hours per day loading dry bulk material (i.e. flour, corn, sand etc.) into trucks that deliver it to the customer that uses it in their production process.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make a website that helps people buy and sell things (www.oodle.com)

lender.name: Shafquat
lender.occupation: student and need loan to do buiness as distributor
lender.loan_because: because i want to start my own retail business in pakistan. plz send me loan as soon as possible, so that i start my business.
lender.occupational_info: i describe my work myself, and send u updats to you with time to time

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mateo's friends
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help others!

lender.name: C J
lender.loan_because: People who are eager to improve their lives inspire me. I've been fortunate enough to do well for myself. Now, I feel it's my duty to give back to others. This is one of the ways I like to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I've done a wide variety of jobs from computer programming to children's entertainment. Currently, I service and repair aircraft in Guam.

lender.name: Claes
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone must have the chans to make there own living, anyway in planet earth. If you have a dollar do give or loane, do it. Love to all..
lender.occupational_info: Making my own living with wife and 4 children, gardening and cleaning. Lot to do every day. Sending love and hope to all of mancind

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Though we may be halfway around the world from each other, I feel it's important to have a connection. By making these ties and learning about others, I hope to be a part of creating a more peaceful global community. "We are all equal now, members of one and the same family, and the affairs of the entire world are now internal affairs." ~The 14th Dalai Lama
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations/businesses spread the word about the work they're doing. This helps them to be more successful and connect with others.

lender.name: Nicholas & Madison
lender.loan_because: We hope to teach our grandchildren to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother and grandmother.

lender.name: Rick & Lynn
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives us the opportunity to see the direct impact we can have on the lives of others.

lender.name: Tatjana
lender.loan_because: I like to see money distributed evenly.
lender.occupational_info: I define the shape, color and function of everyday items, so they are as useful as possible.
